column1: Table 5. Sentenced state prisoners, by age, race, and Hispanic origin, December 31, 1993, 2003, and 2013
Report title: Aging of the State Prison Population, 1993-2013 NCJ 248766

Data source(s): National Prisoner Statistics program, 1993, 2003, and 2013; Survey of Inmates in State Correctional Facilities, 1991 and 2004; and National Corrections Reporting Program, 2003 and 2013
Author(s): E. Ann Carson, William J. Sabol
Table 5. Sentenced state prisoners, by age, race, and Hispanic origin, December 31, 1993, 2003, and 2013

Note: Based on prisoners sentenced to more than 1 year under the jurisdiction of state correctional authorities. Detail may not sum to total due to rounding. See appendix table 3 for standard errors of the 1993 estimates.
a/Excludes persons of Hispanic or Latino origin.

Sources: Bureau of Justice Statistics, National Prisoner Statistics program, 1993, 2003, and 2013; Survey of Inmates in State Correctional Facilities, 1991 and 2004; and National Corrections Reporting Program, 2003 and 2013.
